name: ERSID Stroboscopic Document Reader(RSVP)
short_description: Displays text or information from a document by rapidly "flashing" short segments on the screen.  This has also been called Rapid Serial Visual Presentation (RSVP), and is intended, experimentally, to aid with reading speed and comprehension.
